attributes.action: make St. Davids day a Bank Holiday in Wales on March 1st
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe there is a strong case and heritage that will eventually mean that this one special Welsh day will be made a Bank Holiday in Wales.

Be it of half or full duration recognition of this day as a Bank Holiday will unite the people in what an important celibration of the patron saint of Wales.
